Package com.ericdaugherty.lib.error

Provides classes for handling Exceptions.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
BusinessException Represents a simple Business Exception.
CascadingException Provides the ability to 'cascade' exceptions.
DatabaseException Represents an error that occurs while communicating with the database.
NotFoundException Represents a recoverable error - the item that was queried for could not be found.
SystemException Represents a serious error that occured during processing.
 

Package com.ericdaugherty.lib.error Description

Provides classes for handling Exceptions. All Exceptions in this package depend on the CascadingException, which allows Exceptions to be nested.
